body.content:
DEAR JOHN

I AM VERY HAPPY TO INFORM YOU ABOUT THE NEW ARRANGEMENT MADE BY THE BANK
AUTHORITY. AFTER PROPER AND SEVERAL INVESTIGATIONS AND RESEARCH, THE AFRICA
DEVELOPMENT BANK (ADB) HAS DECIDED TO AVOID THE RISK SENDING YOUR FUNDS
THROUGH DIPLOMATS MEANS.

WE ARE SENDING YOUR $10.5 MILLION THROUGH OUR CORRESPONDENCE BANK UNITED
KINGDOM.
WE HAD FORWARDED INSTRUCTION TO LLOYDS HALIFAX BANK ON YOUR BEHALF FOR YOU
TO RECEIVE THE FUNDS, SO FEEL FREE TO GET IN TOUCH WITH THE LLOYDS HALIFAX
BANK UNITED KINGDOM.

YOU ARE ADVISE TO CONTACT THEM IMMEDIATELY AND DECLARE YOUR ARRIVING DATE
IN UNITED KINGDOM FOR THE OFFICIAL SIGNING AND IMMEDIATE TRANSFER OF YOUR
FUND DEPENDING ON YOUR CHOICE.

BANK NAME: LLOYDS HALIFAX
CONTACT PERSON: DARREN TONG
EMAIL: Lloyds.Halifax@englandmail.com
TELEPHONE NUMBER +44 7451 27622

PLEASE KEEP ME INFORMED AS SOON YOU CONTACT LLOYDS HALIFAX BANK SO I CAN
GIVE YOU ADVISE YOU THE ABOUT FURTHER DEVELOPMENTS IN THIS PROCESS.
IF YOU NEED ANY ASSISTANCE, FEEL FREE TO CONTACT ME. + 226 52 45 88 59.

THANK YOU.
YOUR FRIEND.
Mr Ozobot Obobo
Tel : + 226 52 45 88 59.
